Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, Fighter, Weapon

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    class Sprite holds data about something that needs to be displayed, such as position, size, and what image to display
    Version:
    05.22.18
    Author:
    Pranav Patil
